name: Kemix
description:
A game that was 4 months in development. It was created to help out kids who are learning the periodic table. Its a game about a madeup university student in a madeup university.His task is to retrieve all of the test tubes that contain periodic elements. This task wont be easy, because he is being chased by a crazy scientist thats trying to erase his memory.

Controls:

Movement: W,A,S,D

Use: E

Restart Level: R
